name: Magnetic Forces
description:
A game created for GMTK2021 on Unity,  based on physics where you can explore and complete puzzles with magnetic elements.

Attraction and Repulsion are the base of this game. If you make it through you will get an instant match on Tinder!

WARNING! Be aware of bugs in browser version

Controls:

P1: 

  • WASD -> Move
  • Q -> Change magnet pole
  • S -> Increases magnet's power

P2:

  • ARROWS -> Move
  • Right Control -> Change magnet pole
  • Down arrow -> Increases magnet's power

R -> Reset Map

Thanks for playing! We will read all the comments below.
